title: HELP ADJUSTING MY SCREEN
body: Can anyone help me with my settings for my screen? Currently using a 1920 x 1080 screen laptop. I wanted to have a in game screen with a wider vision the one that looks like the screen is further zoomed out :( saw a lot of pros and streamers have this. I wanted to have this too to improve my skills. Thanks.

replies.body:
Did you try messing with your resolution settings in-game? If you need to do this outside of game, then, unfortunately, I won't be able to assist you in making the manual modifications since we don't support them. :/

Let me know if you have any questions.
